A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst Star Wars movie. Worst than the Phantom Menace. I was in the theater shaking my head in disbelief of how poor the writing was and how terrible the pathetic attempts of humor. How unimaginative the plot was. I do not know what sort of issue Kathleen Kennedy have with men\, but i am smart enough to recognize misandry (hate of men) when I see it. \nToo bad\, they are going to lose a lot of money. I will suggest Disney to remove her before she turns Star Wars into another Ghostbusters 2016 or  DC. They killed the whole franchise with this movie. I am not interested in episode 9.
